rules_text:
{W}{U} ENHANCEMENT Target your own creatures to create the perfect specimen.
{U}{B} MILL The mind is a wonderful thing to waste.
{B}{R} COUNTERS Experiment on your victims with additional counters.
{R}{G} SACRIFICE Science demands a heavy price sometimes. Let others pay it.
{G}{W} IMPLANT Graft strange new abilities onto your creatures.
{W}{B} GRAVEYARD Not all specimens survive. But all of them serve a purpose.
{B}{G} EMERGE Use creatures to fuel bigger monsters as the game goes on.
{G}{U} SPECIATION Embrace variety and be rewarded for multiple creature types.
{U}{R} MUTANTS Born or created, gather your mutant coterie and thrive.
{R}{W} SPELLS Some subjects respond well to stimulus. Cast spells and find out.
